com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm

Class ObjectMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.ObjectMapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestfulMapper, SqliteMapper

    public abstract class ObjectMapper
extends java.lang.Object

    ObjectMapper provides an API for mapping domain objects to database tables and vice versa. For mapping to SQLite databases, see this class's concrete implementation SqliteMapper and for mapping to a RESTful web service, see the RestfulNameValueMapper implementation.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 02/23/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • mapModel

        public abstract ModelMap mapModel(java.lang.Object model)
                           throws InvalidMappingException,
                                  ModelConfigurationException
        Returns a ModelMap object containing persistent model data values mapped to their respective columns.
        Parameters:
        model - the Object to map
        Returns:
        ModelMap with the entity's persistent fields mapped to their columns
        Throws:
        InvalidMappingException - if a type cannot be mapped
        ModelConfigurationException - if the model is configured incorrectly

      • registerTypeAdapter

        public abstract <T> void registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                           TypeAdapter<T> adapter)
        Registers the given TypeAdapter for the specified Class with this SqliteMapper instance. The TypeAdapter allows a Field of this type to be mapped to a database column. Registering a TypeAdapter for a Class which already has a TypeAdapter registered for it will result in the previous TypeAdapter being overridden.
        Parameters:
        type - the Class this TypeAdapter is for
        adapter - the TypeAdapter to register

      • getRegisteredTypeAdapters

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,? extends TypeAdapter<?>> getRegisteredTypeAdapters()
        Returns a Map containing all TypeAdapter instances registered with this ObjectMapper and the Class instances in which they are registered for.
        Returns:
        {@code Map, TypeAdapter>

      • resolveType

        public abstract <T> TypeAdapter<T> resolveType(java.lang.Class<T> type)
                                    throws InvalidMappingException
        Retrieves the TypeAdapter registered for the given Class.
        Parameters:
        type - the Class to retrieve the TypeAdapter for
        Returns:
        TypeAdapter for the specified type
        Throws:
        InvalidMappingException - if there is no registered TypeAdapter for the given Class

      • isTextColumn

        public abstract boolean isTextColumn(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
        Indicates if the given Field is a "text" data type as represented in a database.
        Parameters:
        f - the Field to check
        Returns:
        true if it is a text type, false if not
